dcterms:description: A dataset comprising tweets related to financial topics, labeled as Positive, Negative, or Neutral based on the sentiment expressed in the tweets.
dcterms:title: Twitter Financial News Sentiment (Twitter Train)

dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 2,390 samples of an annotated corpus of finance-related tweets, each labeled as Positive, Negative, or Neutral.
dcterms:title: Twitter financial news sentiment validation (TFSN)

dcterms:creator: Pekka Malo
Ankur Sinha
Pekka Korhonen
Jyrki Wallenius
Pyry Takala
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of samples randomly extracted from financial news articles, annotated by a team of 16 domain experts, with information on the agreement levels among the annotators for each sentence.
dcterms:title: Financial PhraseBank (FPB)
